servinfo.title: DTC No. 33: Control Module Communication Bus Off

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to DTC No. 31: Lost Communication with BCM .

servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

entry.ptxt: Communication is not available with all control modules connected by CAN

s1.ptxt: Clear DTC referring to DTC Clearance .
Start engine and run it for 1 min. or more.
Check DTC referring to DTC Check .

action.ptxt: Go to Keyless Start System Check .

test1.ptxt: Check connection of connectors of all control modules communicating by means of CAN.
Recheck keyless start control module for DTC.

action.ptxt: Intermittent trouble. Check for intermittent referring to Intermittent and Poor Connection Inspection .

testgroup.title: CAN communication circuit check

test1.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to OFF position.
Disconnect connectors of all control modules communicating by means of CAN.
Check CAN communication circuit between control modules for open, short and high resistance.

testgroup.question: Is each CAN communication circuit in good condition?

testgroup.title: DTC check of keyless start control module

test1.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to OFF position.
Connect connectors of disconnected control modules communicating by means of CAN.
Disconnect connector of any one control module other than keyless start control module and combination meter.
Recheck DTC for keyless start control module.

testgroup.question: Is DTC No.33 detected?

paragroup.ptxt: Using same method, disconnect connectors of control module other than keyless start control module and combination meter one by one to check if DTC No.33 is detected.

If DTC No.33 is detected even though connector of control module other than keyless start control module and combination meter is disconnected, substitute a known-good keyless start control module and recheck.

action.ptxt: Check power and ground circuit of disconnected control module. If circuit is OK, substitute a known-good disconnected control module and recheck.
